info.name: PaymentManagement Sandbox
info.description:
This Swagger document describes the PaymentManagemnt API which facilitates a variety of payment methods (including card, eft and carrier billing ) for various opcos (including South Africa, Tanzania, Lesotho and others). This document will be updated as new opcos and payment methods are added.

Current Scope : Carrier Billing (Lesotho and Tanzania), EFT (South Africa), Card (South Africa), International Cards, mpesa (Tanzania)

Contact Support: Email: apipulse@vodacom.co.za

variable.description: (Required) Request Originator Opco. The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the user's country.

request.description: This operation facilitates the processing of Carrier Billing payment transaction

response.name: Too Many Requests
